title: lightlord
author: lightlord
content: Hello There,Mention your credentials, such as past works.I am looking for a signature campaign designer for eloncoin.Full Member to Hero in signature campaign designs.Thanks!

comments.author: hg_away
comments.body: Create a contest like this ----> [CFNP][banned mixer] Signature Design Contest|Reward for Everyone|Winner gets $300+You will be given several signature design options and the best one will get a prize ($100-$300.)

comments.author: xLays
comments.body: Quote from: hg_away on October 17, 2023, 05:39:36 PMCreate a contest like this ----> [CFNP][banned mixer] Signature Design Contest|Reward for Everyone|Winner gets $300+You will be given several signature design options and the best one will get a prize ($100-$300.)I'm one of those who participated in that contest, and there were only 3 participants. I wouldn't recommend it if OP wants to spend less amount and time on a signature design. I've seen some signature designers like Zwei who only charge $15 per set of signature designs. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=3431093.0I want to give it a try but I find it somewhat challenging to create an ASCII art logo for ElonCoin.

comments.author: lucifur
comments.created_time: October 18, 2023, 06:01:03 AMLast edit: October 19, 2023, 07:09:44 AM by lucifur
comments.body: Hello, I am a signature designer. I have previously participated in the coinslotty signature competition and one of the few selected users that got to submit a design. I also have designed some signature before but I haven't had the chance to update the images on my service thread here because of the imgur problem, all images I uploaded is not viewable. I charge min. $10 for a set. You can contact me here for faster response if you'd consider. Thank you!

comments.author: SirJohnVonSlotty
comments.body: I would like to vouch for both @Jayce and @Lucifur, great guys worth every penny.
